title.rendered: Flawless, XYZ Films, and Tea Shop Productions Acquire English Speaking Distribution Rights to Michel Gondry’s Directors’ Fortnight title ‘The Book of Solutions’

excerpt.rendered: With a bold departure from its traditional advertising, this disruptive campaign cements Wilkinson Sword’s role as the ultimate challenger brand.
